login.name: مترجم
login.moto: Bridging the gap between Translation & Development
header.title: Mutrajim
home.start: Let's set up your new Project
home.followSteps: Follow these four steps to make your application culture friendly
home.setupLanguageText: A language has to include a locale code. Locale specifies a region, a date format, and currency.
home.uploadFileText: The file should Contain the keys that would like to import into Phrase. We support a wide range of file formats
home.uploadImageText: The image should be the one in which you have text that you want to convert from one locale to another. We support a wide range of image formats
home.recommendation: We recommend trying one of the following steps to familiarize yourself with phrase
home.invite: Invite your team and localize together
setupLanguages.defaultLocale: Default locale Set the default locale for this project.
setupLanguages.translate: Set the languages you want to translate to
setupLanguages.name: Enter Name
uploadFiles.file: Browse for the file you want to upload
uploadFiles.fileUpload: Select the extension of file you want to upload.
uploadImage.image: Browse for the Image you want to upload
uploadImage.imageUpload: Select the extension of image you want to upload. We support all common file formats.
download.congrats: Congrats! Your file has been successfully Translated.
